```{r}

# Load required libraries
library(readr)  # for read_csv and read_tsv
library(dplyr)  # for data manipulation
# Read SNP and expression metadata
snp_meta <- read_csv("ARID5B_SJCLOUD_20240807.csv")

# Read log2-FPKM normalized expression matrix
fpkm_matrix <- read_tsv("merged.Log2-FPKM_UQ.txt")

# Preview
glimpse(snp_meta)
glimpse(fpkm_matrix)

```
